name: Stranded On Earth (hydra-de)
description:
So this is my first game I have ever created. This is still in development and it will become better later. I will upload updates and bugixes. This is just a prototype and I want your feedback. Just leave a comment if the game is good or not. And say what you would do to make the game better. I hope you like the game. If anyone wants to partner up with me and work together on this game just write me on itch.io or on my Discord : Hydra#8058. I am currently alone so anyone  can work with me. 

And please download the latest versions the old versions are not playable because of bugs. If you find any bugs just contact me please leave a comment under the game. I hope you have fun playing my game.
